tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="HRqeQA6B8EUiHtZlLeky-9" value="<font face="Ubuntu Mono" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Ubuntu+Mono" style="font-size: 22px;"><div style="font-size: 22px; line-height: 24px;"><div style="font-size: 22px;"><font color="#b266ff">var</font>&nbsp;<font color="#ffb570">contador </font><font color="#333333">=</font><font color="#ffb570"> </font><font color="#a680b8">0</font><font style="" color="#333333">;</font></div><div style="font-size: 22px;">&nbsp; &nbsp;<font color="#66b2ff">while</font><font color="#97d077">&nbsp;(</font><font color="#ffb570">contador </font><font color="#333333">=</font><font color="#ffb570"> </font><font color="#a680b8">0</font><font color="#97d077">)</font></div><div style="font-size: 22px;"><font color="#97d077">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</font><font color="#f19c99">console.log(</font><font color="#97d077">"Vuelta nº " </font><font color="#67ab9f">+</font><font color="#97d077">&nbsp;</font><font color="#ffb570">contador</font><font style="background-color: initial;" color="#f19c99">)</font><font style="background-color: initial;" color="#333333">;</font></div><div style="font-size: 22px;"><font color="#97d077">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</font><font color="#ffb570">contador</font><span style="background-color: initial;"><font color="#67ab9f">++</font></span><span style="background-color: initial; color: rgb(151, 208, 119);">&nbsp;</span></div><div style="font-size: 22px;">}</div></div></font>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontFamily=Ubuntu Mono;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DUbuntu%2BMono;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=none;fontSize=22;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="110" y="-120" width="540" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HRqeQA6B8EUiHtZlLeky-21" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;fontSize=12;startSize=8;endSize=8;curved=0;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="400" y="30" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="240" y="-20" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="240" y="30" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HRqeQA6B8EUiHtZlLeky-37" value="<span style="font-size: 20px;">Debemos modificar el valor de contador, que es la condición para que no se la misma y genere un <font color="#ea6b66">bucle infinito</font></span>"
